title: Large-Scale Mathematics Instructional Design Utilizing Web-Based Multimedia Content

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Knowledge and LMS (Learning Management System) Experience
context.additional_context: Emphasis on applying mathematics concepts linked to workplace tasks for working professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can explain core concepts of linear algebra with over 80% accuracy using multimedia content (videos, simulations, etc.) within an LMS.
Learners can complete mathematical project deliverables incorporating peer evaluations and feedback using web-based collaboration tools.
Learners can monitor their learning progress using LMS analytics tools and develop improvement plans.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
